name: Charlotte Linlin
text:
[On Play] Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand at the top of your deck. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
[On K.O] [DON!! -1]: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

effect.text: Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand at the top of your deck. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
[DON!! -1]: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

meta.notes: DON!! -1 on On K.O means return 1 DON!! from field to DON!! deck as cost
